snippet: Marvin Miller's credentials, in the eyes of his many advocates, are without question. But in consideration of his case for Cooperstown, another name also comes to mind: Scott Boras.
abstract: Marvin Miller's credentials, in the eyes of his many advocates, are without question. But in consideration of his case for Cooperstown, another name also comes to mind: Scott Boras.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Also for Your Hall of Fame Consideration, Scott Boras
headline.print_headline: Also for Your Hall of Fame Consideration
